Module org.newsclub.net.unix.demo
Package org.newsclub.net.unix.demo.server

Class EchoServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newsclub.net.unix.server.AFUNIXSocketServer
      • org.newsclub.net.unix.demo.server.EchoServer
  • public final class EchoServer
extends org.newsclub.net.unix.server.AFUNIXSocketServer
    A multi-threaded unix socket server that simply echoes all input, byte per byte.
    Author:
    Christian Kohlschütter
